data.text: Yangʼanirani moyo wanga, pakuti ndine wodzipereka kwa Inu.
Bweretsani chimwemwe kwa mtumiki wanu, Ambuye,
Inu Ambuye, ndinu wokhululuka ndi wabwino,
Pa tsiku la mavuto anga ndidzayitana Inu,
Pakati pa milungu palibe wina wofanana nanu Ambuye;
Mitundu yonse ya anthu imene munayipanga
Pakuti ndinu wamkulu ndipo mumachita zodabwitsa;
Ndidzakutamandani Ambuye Mulungu wanga, ndi mtima wanga wonse;
Pakuti chikondi chanu nʼchachikulu kwa ine;
Inu Mulungu wanga, anthu odzikuza akundithira nkhondo;
Koma Ambuye ndinu Mulungu wachifundo ndi wokoma mtima,
Tembenukirani kwa ine ndipo ndichitireni chifundo;
